Our Moving Services

Complete Moving Solutions for Chicago

At Chicago Pro Movers, we offer a comprehensive range of moving services designed to make your relocation as smooth as possible. Whether you’re moving a small apartment or a large office, we have the expertise and equipment to handle any job.

Residential Moving Services

Apartment & House Moves

  • Studio & 1-Bedroom Moves: Efficient moves for small spaces
  • Family Home Relocations: Complete home moving services
  • High-Rise Building Moves: Expert navigation of Chicago’s tall buildings
  • Condo & Townhouse Moves: Specialized service for multi-unit dwellings

Packing & Unpacking Services

  • Full Packing Service: We pack everything in your home
  • Partial Packing: Pack only specific rooms or items
  • Unpacking Service: We’ll unpack and set up your new home
  • Quality Materials: Professional-grade boxes and packing supplies

Commercial Moving Services

Office Relocations

  • Small Office Moves: 1-10 employee offices
  • Large Office Relocations: Complete business moves
  • Cubicle & Furniture Installation: Professional setup services
  • IT Equipment Moving: Safe transport of computers and electronics

Specialty Commercial Services

  • Retail Store Moves: Minimal downtime for your business
  • Restaurant Equipment: Heavy kitchen equipment relocation
  • Warehouse Moves: Industrial and storage facility relocations
  • Weekend & After-Hours: Move when it doesn’t impact your business

Additional Services

Storage Solutions

  • Short-Term Storage: Perfect for staging your move
  • Long-Term Storage: Secure storage for extended periods
  • Climate-Controlled: Protection for sensitive items
  • 24/7 Security: Your belongings are always safe

Specialty Item Moving

  • Piano Moving: Grand, upright, and baby grand pianos
  • Artwork & Antiques: Custom crating and careful handling
  • Electronics: TVs, computers, and sensitive equipment
  • Large Furniture: Sectionals, armoires, and oversized pieces

Long-Distance Moving

  • Interstate Moves: Moving to or from Illinois
  • Cross-Country Relocations: Coast-to-coast moving services
  • Real-Time Tracking: Know where your belongings are
  • Guaranteed Delivery: On-time arrival promises

Why Choose Our Services?

Professional Equipment

  • Modern moving trucks with GPS tracking
  • Professional-grade moving equipment
  • Clean, well-maintained vehicles
  • Specialized tools for difficult moves

Experienced Team

  • Background-checked employees
  • Ongoing training programs
  • Years of Chicago moving experience
  • Friendly, professional service

Comprehensive Insurance

  • Full valuation coverage available
  • Basic coverage included
  • Additional insurance options
  • Claims handled quickly and fairly
